Unique code which identifies the GRID.REFERENCE record. It is keyed on five elements :
- the type of comparison (SAM for a portfolio, CMP for a consolidate one)
- the customer security account for a portfolio or the AM.COMPARE id for a consolidate one
- the matrix code
- the line number (abscissa)
- and column number (ordinate).
Example : SAM.100032-1.AST-CCY.2.5
A maximum of 43 alphanumeric characters may be entered
